main event: Multiple civilian witnesses reported seeing a saucer-shaped, intense white object that appeared to land and then take off again, moving erratically at high speeds over various areas of Virginia and towards Washington D.C.
interesting points: The object was observed to first appear as two objects and then merge into one.
The object was estimated to be at a slant range of approximately 18,000 feet.
The object was observed moving from the direction of Washington D.C., hovering as if attempting to land, and then disappearing towards the northeast in the direction of Washington D.C.
The sighting was reported by an 11-year-old witness and also by a Colonel from the Civil Air Patrol.
A Bolling Air Force Base civilian employee also reported seeing an aircraft with extremely bright lights in the vicinity of Washington D.C. around the same time.
witnesses: multiple civilian witnesses, including an 11-year-old and a Civil Air Patrol Colonel
